name: Tao.js
tagline: A javascript plugin that displays a different excerpt from the Tao Te Ching on every page load.
body:
####Tao.js --- #####Still in production Todo: * Finish formatting the translation from ```tao.txt```. * Is there a more efficient way to make a string of all of the excerpts? --- A javascript plugin that displays a different excerpt from the Tao Te Ching on every page load. No jQuery needed, just include ```tao.js``` on your site, and add an element with the id ```tao```. *Example: ```
- Laozi -
```
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
